tweet: Today is Small Business Saturday! I hope you’ll take the time to stop at your favorite neighborhood small business. They are the lifeblood of our economy. Visit your favorite small business and support your neighborhood and community! #ShopSmall #SmallBusinessSaturday

33 days to #RepealDeviceTax! Congress has agreed for 5 years that the #MedicalDeviceTax should not go into effect. At the end of the year, this job-killing tax will be imposed. In 2015, I took to the House Floor to say the same thing I am saying today. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZHSQ1AymDqA …
Wishing you all a happy Thanksgiving with those you love the most! As Americans and Minnesotans - we have so much to be grateful for. Happy Thanksgiving to all!

Due to our farmer's hard work, the cost of a Thanksgiving meal is less than $5 per person according to the @FarmBureau & turkeys, which Minnesota is the largest producer of, are 4% cheaper than last year! For the world’s most affordable food supply, don’t forget to #ThankAFarmer!

Recently, my colleagues in the House and Senate showed Americans living in farm country that they have our full support by providing funding for FRSAN. An initial 450,000 was granted to @UMNExt and Iowa Extension to begin a pilot program. https://emmer.house.gov/press-releases?ContentRecord_id=01FCE843-7ED4-4EBC-A75A-A057F8696A92 …

The Farm Bill passed the House and was ultimately signed by @POTUS, with my STRESS Act included. I was proud to see this effort move forward with support from my colleagues on both sides of the aisle. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kGxyfsY2vHE&feature=youtu.be …

Read more background on the intention behind the STRESS Act via the @sctimes here ↓ https://www.sctimes.com/story/news/local/2018/03/14/congressman-emmer-has-proposed-bill-offer-mental-health-programs-mitigate-farmer-suicides-possibly-j/423513002/ …

The Farm and Ranch Stress Assistance Network (FRSAN) will give states needed resources to provide services including hotlines, community outreach, education, & home delivery of assistance. I was successful in including this language in the 2018 Farm Bill. https://emmer.house.gov/press-releases?ContentRecord_id=8094F811-655E-4CEE-A7C6-D99A82FF2232 …

As a result, I introduced the Stemming the Tide of Rural Economic Stress and Suicide (STRESS) Act to make mental health treatment available for farmers, ranchers, & agricultural workers by reauthorizing the Farm and Ranch Stress Assistance Network (FRSAN). https://emmer.house.gov/2018/3/emmer-introduces-legislation-address-farmer-suicide-crisis …

Livelihoods of those who feed, fuel & clothe the world depend on factors largely outside of their control, which can be a uniquely stressful environment. They also lack access to mental health services. In half of the U.S. counties, there is no psychiatrist or psychologist.

According to a 2016 @CDCGov report, people working in agriculture had one of the highest rates of suicide, due to the nature of their work and the lack of access to mental health care professionals in rural America.
Farm work is noble, but it can take its toll. I am proud to represent and support some of Minnesota’s rural communities, which is why I introduced the STRESS Act last Congress.

On Thanksgiving, it's important to remember and be grateful for those who produce all the food our families enjoy, both today and every day. Farmers and ranchers work endlessly to ensure our grocery stores are full and our children are nourished.

35 days until the #MedicalDevice Tax suspension expires. Nearly 35,000 Minnesotans employed in this industry depend on the suspension of the #MedicalDeviceTax. It’s time to end this tax on innovation. #RepealDeviceTax

36 days until the #MedicalDeviceTax suspension expires. This tax makes it tough for small medical device companies to grow and continue to innovate. 80% of these businesses have 50 employees or fewer. #RepealDeviceTax

WiFi has allowed for connectivity & innovation. I’m proud to have sent a letter to the FCC supporting this action. Thanks to Chairman @AjitPaiFCC for putting forward a reasonable compromise in the 5.9 GHz band to power next-gen connectivity. https://twitter.com/FCC/status/1197281648401960960 …

Saddened to hear of the passing of former @MNhospitals leader Lorry Massa. It was truly an honor to work with him. His impact on health care will be felt for years to come. I have no doubt hearts are heavy in Minnesota today. Praying for comfort for his family and friends.
37 days until the #MedicalDeviceTax suspension expires. We need to support life-saving innovation. Let Minnesota continue to be a leader in this industry. #RepealDeviceTax

Nick has defied the odds over and over again and has devoted more than a decade to serving the Elk River and Big Lake communities he loves. I am truly proud to call Nick a friend. Jacquie and I wish the best for him, Bette, & their son as they enter the next phase in their lives.
Representative @NickZerwas has been the embodiment of what a citizen legislator should be. A leader in Saint Paul, Representative Zerwas has tackled some of the biggest issues facing Minnesota.

38 days until the #MedicalDeviceTax suspension expires. With the fear of reinstating the tax, many Minnesota businesses must make a difficult choice to withhold from long-term investments to prepare for the tax. We need to encourage innovation and growth, not discourage!

This week, the Manning family visited D.C. to accept the Angels in Adoption award on behalf of their loved one, Stacy. She was an outstanding adoptive mother and advocate in #MN06. I was proud to honor her memory on the House Floor. #NationalAdoptionDay pic.twitter.com/7npaceu5DX
39 days until the #MedicalDeviceTax suspension expires. There are over 700 medical device companies that call Minnesota home. This tax will be detrimental to their growth. #RepealDeviceTax
40 days until the #MedicalDeviceTax suspension expires. Last time the tax went into effect, the medical device industry lost nearly 29,000 jobs. #RepealDeviceTax

Our caseworkers work tirelessly to solve any issues you may have with federal agencies. Please reach out to our Otsego office if you need assistance navigating a federal agency:  https://emmer.house.gov/casework

185,000 Minnesotans live with COPD. As the fifth-leading cause of death in Minnesota, it is important we raise awareness for this terrible disease. I am committed to ensuring that @NIH has the funding it needs to ensure research continues. #COPDAwarenessMonth pic.twitter.com/QneDebp9Qo

Today, in honor of #NationalRuralHealthDay, I was proud to announce a $230,000 grant from @USDA to @centracare_mn to implement telemedicine stations throughout #MN06 which will provide access for constituents across rural communities in my district. https://emmer.house.gov/press-releases?id=5C1D9E63-E112-47A8-8ECE-A9A739384F62 …
41 days until the #MedicalDeviceTax suspension expires. When the tax was in effect in 2013, research and development investment suffered by $34 million. #RepealDeviceTax
42 days until the #MedicalDeviceTax suspension expires. When the tax went into effect in 2013, more than 25 percent of the tax was paid for by Minnesota businesses!

I sent a letter to @AppropsDems Chairwoman @NitaLowey requesting a meeting to discuss the impact the #MedicalDeviceTax will have if we do not act. I am urging her and her colleagues on the committee to include a full repeal or at least suspend the tax in any budget agreement. pic.twitter.com/YXwXeBZq6H
Hard to believe my youngest is 18 years old today! Happy birthday to my son, John. My wife Jacquie and I can’t wait to see what the future holds for him. pic.twitter.com/W843dnhaol

Health professionals have been struggling to provide quality mental health care. 47 days until the #MedicalDeviceTax suspension expires! If Congress does not act, this tax will go into effect on January 1.  In 2016, Congress suspended this 2.3% excise tax, which was mandated by Obamacare. #RepealDeviceTax
